enhanced_description: Red & White Consulting is a boutique consulting firm established in 2013, specializing in data-driven strategies across Human Analytics, Financial Analytics, and Business Analytics. The firm is supported by a team of two principal consultants, both top talents formerly with Citi Indonesia, offering deep and complementary expertise. They focus on transforming Business Intelligence & Analytics functions, helping organizations 'connect the dots' to turn data into profit. Their services include data-driven analytical methods and tools to align and optimize human capital with business objectives for increased effectiveness and efficiency (Talent Analytics); strategic business planning for sustained business performance and profitability (Financial Analytics); and creating innovative solutions to meet short-term and long-term profitability goals (Business Analytics). Red & White Consulting has a proven international track record, having consulted for Global and Large Enterprises in Indonesia, Singapore, Malaysia, Taiwan, South Korea, Hong Kong, and China, across diverse industries such as Manufacturing, Retail, NGO, and Banking.
